title: Sampler, 1739
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, chain, cross, stem, and button hole stitches with deflected element work on plain weave foundation
description: Thirty-five squares of patterns at top; bands of pattern at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1739.
1739. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, chain, cross, stem, and button hole stitches with deflected element work on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-266.
